snippet.title: SUMMIT - Virtual Pro Wrestling Gamma - Intro
snippet.description:
Officially announcing the existence of my WWF Wrestlemania ROM hack today, "SUMMIT". No plugins were used in the creation of this hack and, more importantly, it should hopefully run on actual hardware, barring any unforeseen issues.

The hack brings together favorites from all across the Virtual Pro Wrestling series (except for No Mercy), expanding that AKI Battle concept into a full-fledged hack.

Please bear in mind that the hack is still a work in progress, and that some things in this intro may be subject to change -- although, at this stage, it's unlikely to be anything drastic.

Also, want to stress how this would not be possible without VPW Studio, nor the guidance of guys like freem, SK Stylez, Melonbread, and RetroRandyPrice. The community's a great place to be.
